name: canvas_titles_get_recommend
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool webtoon.
Tool description: This API provides the largest webcomics data in the world to create a comic site/application such as webtoons.com
API description: Get similar comics
*To load images, please check the tutorial at https://rapidapi.com/apidojo/api/webtoon/tutorials/how-to-load-images

titleno.description: The value of the `titleNo` field returned from the `/canvas/titles/list`, `/canvas/search`, or `/canvas/home` endpoint.

language.description: The language code for the response. One of the following: 'en', 'zh-hant', 'de', 'fr', 'es', 'th', 'id'. Defaults to 'en'.
